title: Doubt Regarding Kcet Marks Entry Into PES Portal
content:
Currently i am entering my Kcet 2025 marks into the PES portal and i have a query about the section labelled as "Total Score" for all the 3 subjects. Should I enter my aggregate marks(Board+kcet marks) of the respective subject or only the kcet marks of that respective subject into the box given..

 Kindly Suggest.

comments.body: Bro i can't enter the full kcet number in it
